name: Jump Coots
description:
Jump Coots is a Jump King inspired game featuring the lovable Coots the cat! This was made in 10 days for the Ludwig Jam 2023! The current record is 1 minute and 44 seconds, try to beat it if you dare!

Programmers:

  • Alex "Dicko" Dickinson  
  • Matthew "Malphatt" Freeman 

Art:

  • Alex "Dicko" Dickinson

Level Design:

  • Matthew "Malphatt" Freeman

Music:

  • Unicorn Heads - Boardroom Theme
